articles.title: See Alex Jones' reaction when mom confronts him with the truth about her son - CNN Video
articles.description: Parents of Sandy Hook victims shared their devastating testimony in a Texas courtroom in one of several defamation cases against conspiracy theorist Alex Jones who also testified. CNN's Miguel Marquez reports.

articles.author: Ben Wedeman, CNN
articles.title: As CPAC gets set to welcome Hungary's hardline leader Viktor Orban, his policies at home are under new scrutiny
articles.description: CPAC asked Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban to share the success he's had with hard-right policies. But in his own capital of Budapest, the cracks are beginning to show in the economy and popular support.
articles.content: Budapest, Hungary (CNN)As he walked up the steps to greet former President Donald Trump at Trump's Bedminster golf club in New Jersey, Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban seemed to be modeling hims… [+3001 chars]

articles.title: Watch moment attorney exposes Alex Jones' dishonesty during Sandy Hook trial - CNN Video
articles.description: During the Sandy Hook defamation trial, attorneys for the plaintiffs presented text messages from right-wing radio host Alex Jones that they say prove Jones lied about spreading misinformation about the Sandy Hook shooting and its victims. CNN's Miguel Marque…

articles.author: Dan Merica, CNN
articles.title: 'Kansas will not be our last fight': Abortion rights victory gives Democrats new hope for midterms
articles.description: It isn't often that Democrats look to deep-red Kansas for resounding affirmation. But on Tuesday night, when Kansans overwhelmingly voted to keep protections for abortion rights in their state constitution, that is exactly what happened.
articles.content: (CNN)It isn't often that Democrats look to deep-red Kansas for resounding affirmation. But on Tuesday night, when Kansans overwhelmingly voted to keep protections for abortion rights in their state c… [+7968 chars]

articles.author: Brad Lendon, CNN
articles.title: PLA forces encircle Taiwan as Chinese live-fire drills begin
articles.description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi is no longer in Taiwan, but on Thursday China made good on its promise that the island will pay a price for hosting the highest-ranking US official to visit in 25 years.
articles.content: (CNN)US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi is no longer in Taiwan, but on Thursday China made good on its promise that the island will pay a price for hosting the highest-ranking US official to visit in 25 y… [+6306 chars]

articles.title: New head of Alex Jones' company faces questions from lawyers for Sandy Hook families

articles.author: Oliver Darcy, CNN Business
articles.title: Sandy Hook family attorney exposes Alex Jones' dishonesty during brutal cross-examination
articles.description: The dishonesty of right-wing conspiracy theorist Alex Jones was spotlighted in a Texas court on Wednesday as a lawyer for a pair of Sandy Hook parents cross-examined the Infowars founder and fact-checked his answers in real-time.

articles.author: Opinion by Nicole Hemmer
articles.title: Opinion: The scariest part of the Alex Jones story
articles.description: Nicole Hemmer writes that as Alex Jones sits through a hearing to determine damages he will need to pay to Sandy Hook parents, it's important to remember that Jones and his vile conspiracy theories are no longer limited to the fringes. He has become a part of…

articles.title: Sandy Hook parents testify about the 'hell' Alex Jones inflicted on them through lies about the shooting

articles.author: CNN
articles.title: The Alex Jones-ification of the GOP
articles.description: Alex Jones has been peddling conspiracy theories since the 1990s. Now, the GOP appears to have drifted toward his worldview.
